data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 4 believers in the state of Miquelon-Langlade to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Miquelon-Langlade, Saint Pierre and Miquelon
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Miquelon-Langlade, Saint Pierre and Miquelon to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Miquelon-Langlade.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Miquelon-Langlade, Saint Pierre and Miquelon.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Miquelon-Langlade, Saint Pierre and Miquelon.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Miquelon-Langlade. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 149 neighbors who are far from you in Miquelon-Langlade. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.section_summary:
the state of Miquelon-Langlade, Saint Pierre and Miquelon has a population of 600.

We estimate Miquelon-Langlade has 4 people who might know Jesus, 575 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 21 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 149 neighbors who need Jesus.
